document.full_text: three women who persuaded people in the united states and the caribbean to send them thousands of dollars to be cleansed of evil spirits and demons have been arrested and charged with fraud, officials said on monday.
document.title: three charged in florida over "demon cleansing" fraud
lines_and_colors: three women who persuaded people in the united states and the caribbean to send them thousands of dollars to be cleansed of evil spirits and demons have been arrested and charged with fraud, officials said on monday.
